title: [K-12] Integrated Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy (HCM) Instructional Design: Knowledge Transformation Model-Based Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic cardiovascular anatomy and molecular biology knowledge
context.additional_context: A multidisciplinary approach is needed for integrating medical education curricula. Digital-based learning content and practical sessions should be conducted in parallel.

learning_goals: Can explain the role of DNA hydroxymethylation in the pathogenic mechanisms of HCM
Can analyze myocardial sarcomere distribution and mitochondrial morphological changes from a histological perspective
Can interpret genomic expression patterns by comparing HCM patient biopsy specimens with control group data
Can design an HCM diagnostic framework integrating anatomical, biochemical, and genetic knowledge
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
